duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain organized and efficient office operations
Manage office document collection, processing, and organization in Google Drive
Maintain School of STEM webpages and social media accounts
Perform data collection, as well as basic analysis and visualization for projects that support the School of STEM
Place orders, process invoices, maintain service contracts, and maintain budget
Maintain schedule of appointments for Dean
Coordinate arrangements for meetings, special events, and activities

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree; or equivalent combination of education and experience.
